Occasionally you crave a specific ingredient, and sometimes you just don't want a certain thing in your recipes. Swipe right to include, and left to exclude any ingredient.
Each wheel can be rotated to a filter of your choice, and either required or excluded. Add as many filters as you'd like. Allergies and diets can obviously only be required!
